## Requirements

Attendees are requested to have the following ready:

- Laptop with R/RStudio installed ([instructions](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/))

- R packages installed ([instructions](files/FHM_Workshop_Packages_PROTECT.pdf))
   + CRAN: `locits`, `zoo`, `forecast`, `tibble`, `lpacf`, `BootWPTOS`.
   + GitHub: `forecastLSW`
   
- Their own time series dataset to analyse

- **[Session 1]** Nonstationary Time Series: Models and Tests ([pdf](files/FHM_Workshop_Session_1_PROTECT.pdf))

- **[Session 3]** Local Autocovariance, Local Partial Autocovariance, Forecasting ([pdf](files/FHM_Workshop_Session_3_PROTECT.pdf))
